name: Ace Raiders
description:
The aliens from the Sharr Empire are about to attack one of the most important colonies in the Golden Empire, planet Gendarme. A space pilot by the name of Elliot who is piloting the sr-71b Peregrine Falcon Jet and is the leader of the Blade Squadron is tasked with ending the alien invasion. The aliens are planning one of the biggest assaults yet by bringing some massive ships into the battle. 

Note: The game is very loud so lower the volume before you play this game. 

If boss does not appear even after a minute, refresh the page.

Instructions:

Press "W" to move forward. 
Press "A" to move left. 
Press "S" to move down. 
Press "D" to move right. 
Press "Space" to shoot. 

Destroy enemies and the boss to win. 
Avoid bullets to not take damage. 
Collect power ups to score more points.
